facts.description: AGV (Astra Guild Ventures) conducted private sale rounds, raising significant funds.

source.text: Astra Guild Ventures (AGV) has successfully closed its PRIVATE SALE B round with $3.0 Million last November 30, 2021. The Private Sale B round was mainly participated by venture capital firms and crypto influencers.

facts.explanation: This tweet explicitly mentions a substantial financial investment from venture capital firms and influencers, indicating a clear investment of money.

facts.description: AGV encourages public participation in their token sale.

source.text: If you want to earn money!💰💰💰 You know what to do!!! Dec 10. We will launching the AGV Launchpad!!! To the Public!!! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻 Unbelievable Honest Review that can't be match by anyone else in the cryptospace. Altcoin Buzz is the man!!

facts.explanation: This tweet directly solicits public investment in their token sale, implying an opportunity for financial involvement.

facts.description: AGV raised substantial funds in multiple funding rounds.

source.text:
The raised funds will be used for marketing AGV's public token sale, covering operational and management expenses, and for the acquisition of new NFTs and equities on companies that develop P2E games.

AGV has raised a total of $5.3 Million after its Seed and Series A funding.

facts.explanation: This tweet indicates multiple rounds of fundraising, showing ongoing investment opportunities and significant capital inflow.

facts.description: AGV operates as a DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) connecting investors and players.

source.text: RT @SpringDawnVC: @AstraGuild is a DAO where visionary investors and videogame players connect each other to capture the rise of NFT Games.…

facts.explanation: This description suggests a common enterprise where the fortunes of investors and players are interlinked in the NFT gaming ecosystem.

facts.description: AGV aims to create a transparent virtual economy.

source.text: "I have seen how AGV works, and there is no other DAO capable of creating a fully transparent virtual economy other than them. AGV also has a great team behind them who have been working tirelessly to help speed up the adoption of new NFT and blockchain projects," said Evan.

facts.explanation: This tweet emphasizes the creation of a shared virtual economy, indicating a common enterprise among participants.

facts.description: AGV explicitly promotes the potential for earnings through their platform.

source.text: If you want to earn money!💰💰💰 You know what to do!!! Dec 10. We will launching the AGV Launchpad!!! To the Public!!! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻 Unbelievable Honest Review that can't be match by anyone else in the cryptospace. Altcoin Buzz is the man!!

facts.explanation: This tweet directly appeals to people's desire to make money, creating a clear expectation of profits.

facts.description: AGV highlights their significant monthly earnings from NFT games.

source.text:
🎮Astra Guild Ventures creates value for everyone within the community through earnings from #NFTGames. The #DAO generates over USD 1 Million monthly in #NFT earnings

📈The earning potential is proportional to the amount of scholars within the community

#AGV #DAO #PlayToEarn

facts.explanation: By showcasing substantial monthly earnings, AGV creates an expectation of profits for community members.

facts.description: AGV promotes staking as a way to earn substantial rewards.

source.text:
🪙📈Generally, you make more profit with staking as you continue to stake more. However, there are other things to consider when it comes to increasing your profits:

—Coin Value
—Fixed Supply
—Actual Applications

$AGV #Guild #Stake #CryptoNews #Trade

facts.explanation: This tweet directly links staking to profit-making, creating an expectation of returns for participants.

facts.description: AGV emphasizes high returns from yield farming in DeFi.

source.text:
🧑‍🌾📈#Yieldfarming involves staking or lending crypto assets to generate high returns or rewards in #cryptocurrency & unlocks earning opportunities for liquidity providers & platform owners which has led to an increased demand for its development

$AGV #Guild #defiyield

facts.explanation: By highlighting 'high returns' from yield farming, AGV creates a strong expectation of profits for participants.

facts.description: AGV emphasizes the efforts of their team in developing and managing projects.

source.text:
Thrill and excitement awaits this new venture knowing that we are in very capable hands. 🤲🏻

From marketing, operations, tokenomics, down to project management, this new all-star team is STACKED! 💯

facts.explanation: This tweet highlights the expertise and efforts of the AGV team, suggesting that profits depend on the work of others rather than the investors themselves.

facts.description: DIG showcases meetings and collaborations with industry experts.

source.text: Today's next big meeting with @haydnsnape, Roshan and Sumit from @DIG_Intl to advise and seamlessly integrate their blockchain/tech expertise into @realmsofeth 💥💥🚀 "This would be how the future of #P2E game should look like" #playtoearn #NFTCommunity #rethtothemoon

facts.explanation: This tweet emphasizes the efforts of experienced team members and advisors in developing and improving the project.

facts.description: AGV highlights the efforts of their advisory board in guiding the project.

source.text:
These thought leaders will offer guidance for future decisions being made within Astra Guild Ventures and provide input and feedback to guarantee the success of AGV projects.

Read more: https://t.co/6upXmvFXsS

#AGV #NFT #Blockchain #PlayToEarn #NFTGames #BlockchainGames #gaming

facts.explanation: This tweet underscores the role of external advisors in ensuring the project's success, indicating that profits depend on the efforts of others.
